TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Honduras, title = Honduras, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honduras} }

S.FORM: u Honduras sa i labu nu Congnanmeico, itiza i 15 00 N, 86 30 W u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 112,090 km2 u ahebal nu lalaay sa 111,890 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 200 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 8,893,259. kakalukan umah sa 28.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 45.30%, zumaay henay umah sa 25.90% tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Tegucigalpa . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 15 bulad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Juan Orlando Hernández, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 1 bulad 27 demiad. Hungdulasi宏都拉斯 Hongdulasi u " Spain a kamu Repu'blica de Honduras", inutebanan a Amilika kapulugnan a kanatal, satipan a belaw u Guatemala (Kuwa-ti-mala 瓜地馬拉), satipan timulan matatules tu El Salvador (Sa-al-wa-tu 薩爾瓦多), capi i nuwalian atu nutimulan u Nicaragua (Ni-ciya-la-kuw 尼加拉瓜), capi i nuwalian atu nuwamisan nu Caribbean a bayu (Ciya-le'-pihay 加勒比海) , nutimulan micapi tu waliyu a Hung-say-cya-wan . i likut nu Ta-lu tu Caribbean a bayu (Ciya-le'-pihay 加勒比海) izaw henay ku Swan Islands (Tiane-qundao 天鵝群島), Gulf Islands (Hay-wan-cyun a subal 海灣群島) a lala'an. kahenulan a tuse u Tegucigalpa (Te-gu-xi-jia-ba 德古西加巴). Republica de Hondura, Hongdulasi han pangangan Hongdulasi u ngangan nu kanatal namakay nakamuan nu mitesakay nu paybalunga ci Kelis- tuw-bu Ke-lun-pu i 1502 a mihcaan itini a lala'an a tukus tahkal hawsa, maazih ya balunga la'cus i pantaay a bayu kaliyuhan ka talulung nu bayu, pa'teng han a pangangan tu nu zumaay a ngangan "Hondura" han "u kamu nu Spain " talulungay han" a imi. i kasumamadan mamin i kanatal a ti-tu pangangan han tu Hungdula' . laylay歷史 aazihan a ceding laylay nu Hungdulasi kasumamadan tu 4～7 a mihcaan, Hungdulasi satipan u Ma-ya u kapulungan nu talakaway a lalangawan. 1502 a mihcaan Kelun-pu katukuh i Hungdulasi a Hay-wan-cyun a subal, Hungdulasi atu Ouzhou namalingatu mapulung, 1524 a mihcaan Spain a hitay malingatu tu misulul tu Hungdulasi , uyzaan a mihcaan mala u nu micumuday tu nu Spain a tademaw. 1537～1539 a mihcaan ci Lay-mu-pila a Cung-tung tulu a mang ku Yin-di'-an a tademaw ku palekalay a misabalucu', micuay tu micumuday nu Xibanya a tademaw tu pikuwanan. 1539 a mihcaan, Hungdulasi makelac tu panukas tu Kuwa-ti Ma-la u pikuwanan tu hita a kenis. Hungdulasi i 1821 a mihcaan siwa a bulad sabaw lima a demiad musakamu tu a misateked, nika 1822 a mihcaan papulung a pacumud tu Mo-si-ke u saayaway Hung-ti a kanatal. 1823 a mihcaan micumud tu Federacion de Centro America, 1838 a mihcaan cacay bataan a bulad miliyas tu Federacion de Centro America, patizeng tu Kung-he-ku. 1840 a mihcaan Hungdulasi i Kuwa-ti-mala misakakuay mikuwanay pidamaen ni La-fei-er Ka-ley-la, u misatekeday ci Fulang-sis-ke Fere-la patizeng tu masakakuay mikuwanay tu Cen-bu. zikuzan nu1853 a mihcaan, Hungdulasi i lalabu nu kanatal u misakakuay atu misatekeday hina kikasubad ku nipikuwan atu mangayaw ku lalabu, sangaleb satu ku nikakutay ku mikawaway nu cun-bu. u kim, ging kwang mapeci' tuway, malilid tu ku tabakiay a sapalahad tu cin-ci'. makay 1840 a mihcaan malingatu. u Yingguo micalap tu Hongdalasi nu nuwalian a kakitizaan atu Ba-ya-qundao, misanga' tu zazan nu silamalay, a maala ku ahebalal a lala' a situngus a micaliw atu pacaliw. kasumamadan tu19 a mihcaan tu zikuzan, Meiguo miala tu Sheng-hu-anxi-tuo a kakitizaan situngus tu sapiala tu ging kuwang. kasumamadad tu 20 a mihcaan tu kalingatu, Meiguo pulung tunu heci piyangay a kakanan a kusi tatungusay a heci piyangan a kakanan a kusi mialaw tu nuwamisan mililis tu bayu masaenalay a lala' , palahad paluma tu paza', a mihamin mialaw tu zazan nu silamalay, nu bayuay a saculu', dingkiay atu sapacakay tu paza'. katukuh i 1913 a mihcaan Hungdulasi payhun 90% kayadah ku pasay nu zumaan a kalaliwnan maemec nu Meiguo. i saayaway a ngangayaw nu kitakit hawsa, Meiguo sangaleb kalamkam satu tu Hungdulasi a cen-ce miemec atu mialaw tu cin-ci. kinapina tu patahkal tu hitay a mikuwan tu lalabuay a kawaw nu Hungdulasi , miemec a misakaku mikuwan tu lalabu nu kanatal. i pulung nu piyangan hecian a kusi tu piemec hawsa, Hungdulasi mala u ngangaan tu nu palumaay tu paza' uynian cacayay nu kanatal a cin-ci. dadawa malahad ku nipalumaad a paza'. katukuh 1930 a mihcaan nipacakayan a paza' u saayaway mutizeng i kitakit. 1929 a mihcaan i kitakitay misakaku tu nu uzipay a nizatengan kalihanawan ku cin-ci u cin-ci nu Hungdulasi baeket ku nikasetul, caay tu ka kapah ku nikauzi nu binawlan amin, u tademaw amin lalid a sibalucu' micuay a mingayaw. Hungdulasi a Kuw-min-tang a Cung-tung ci " Tiburcio Carias Andino" i picuzuh pidama nu Meiguo hawsa, i 1933 a mihcaan maala tu ku sapikuwan tu lalabuay a kawaw. patizeng satu tu misakakuay a mikuwan, 1954 a mihcaan uynian a kanatal a pcakat tu lipida nu mikuliay a tademaw, misakapah tu sakauzip atu maydih milihiza tu kung-huy a situngus palekal a papihibang tu misakawaway, u Meiguo pakayni piketun piselep tu kalisiw sibalucu' tu a misulul. hekal nu lala' Hungdulasi i Tay-pin-yang atu Cye-le-pi-hay, u angangangan u buyu' a lala' lalabu nu kanatal u lanu' nu ungcuy a enal i dadipasan izaw kya likecuay a masaenalay a kakitizaan. u bali pasu pakay sasa nu lala' a akuti'ay a bali katukuh i buyu' alababay tu ku bali. i bayuay atu buyu'ay pasay bung-puw a mihcaan u udad katuku i tulua malebut haw-mi. cin-ci Hungdulasi a cin-ci a wayway i Cung-mey-cuw u tu tungusa tu, 2012 a mihcaan u piasip Hungdulasi a pademaw palalecad GDP 2.323 ku kalisiw nu Meiguo, nisangaan a aca satalakaway ayaw tu lima a lamangan u nilaculan nipalumaan tu kuhi, paza' ku nipalumaan, nipahabanay u kabus atu nanpukuy, cung-li a simal atu misangaay tu zikuc. aidangan Hungdulasi izaw ku tusa a lice nu niliwanan a saysang i kitakid, nu ke-pan Ma-ya i kasumamadanay u mapeciay tu kakitizaay a luma' atu Rio Platano Biosphere Reserve. tademaw katukuh ayza 2018 a mihcaan, Hungdulasi u pulung nu tademaw 9,587,522. 2010 a mihcaan sabaw lima a mihcaan a tademaw palalecad pahun 36,8%, sabaw lima katukuh enem a bataan izaw ku lima a mihcaan payhun 58,9%, enem a bataan izaw ku lima a mihcaan atu pikakaan tu payhun4,3%. Hungdulasi a saykay a kasabinacadan palalecad payhun90% u may-s-ti-suw a tademaw, payhun 7% u Me-cuw in-ti-an a tademaw, payhun 2% u lemeniay a tademaw atu payhun 1% u salengacay a tademaw. caculilan Hungdulasi tusa ku tabakiay nu kanatal a pahikukian, itini i List of airports in Honduras atu Saeropuerto Internacional Ramon Villeda Morales. Honngdulasi u tapang a saculul u zazan nu basu, u silamalay a zazan u sapiculu' tu paza' atu tebus tu nikaluky a tuud dada' Hondulasi izaw ku Puerto cortes, tela, lasay-wa a minatu, uynian a kanatal uyzaan aca u sihataay a balunga' ku sitatngusay a mikuwan.

o Hondoras sa i labo no Congnanmeico, itiza i 15 00 N, 86 30 W o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 112,090 km2 o ahebal no lalaay sa 111,890 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 200 km2 hamin no tademaw sa 8,893,259. kakalokan omah sa 28.80%, kilakilangan omah sa 45.30%, zomaay henay omah sa 25.90% tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Tegocigalpa . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 15 bolad 9 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Joan Orlando Hernández, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 1 bolad 27 demiad. Hongdolasi宏都拉斯 Hongdolasi o " Spain a kamo Repo'blica de Hondoras", inotebanan a Amilika kapolognan a kanatal, satipan a belaw o Goatemala (Kowa-ti-mala 瓜地馬拉), satipan timolan matatoles to El Salvador (Sa-al-wa-to 薩爾瓦多), capi i nowalian ato notimolan o Nicaragoa (Ni-ciya-la-kow 尼加拉瓜), capi i nowalian ato nowamisan no Caribbean a bayo (Ciya-le'-pihay 加勒比海) , notimolan micapi to waliyo a Hong-say-cya-wan . i likot no Ta-lo to Caribbean a bayo (Ciya-le'-pihay 加勒比海) izaw henay ko Swan Islands (Tiane-qondao 天鵝群島), Golf Islands (Hay-wan-cyon a sobal 海灣群島) a lala'an. kahenolan a tose o Tegocigalpa (Te-go-xi-jia-ba 德古西加巴). Repoblica de Hondora, Hongdolasi han pangangan Hongdolasi o ngangan no kanatal namakay nakamoan no mitesakay no paybalonga ci Kelis- tow-bo Ke-lon-po i 1502 a mihcaan itini a lala'an a tokos tahkal hawsa, maazih ya balonga la'cos i pantaay a bayo kaliyohan ka talolong no bayo, pa'teng han a pangangan to no zomaay a ngangan "Hondora" han "o kamo no Spain " talolongay han" a imi. i kasomamadan mamin i kanatal a ti-to pangangan han to Hongdola' . laylay歷史 aazihan a ceding laylay no Hongdolasi kasomamadan to 4～7 a mihcaan, Hongdolasi satipan o Ma-ya o kapolongan no talakaway a lalangawan. 1502 a mihcaan Kelon-po katokoh i Hongdolasi a Hay-wan-cyon a sobal, Hongdolasi ato Oozhoo namalingato mapolong, 1524 a mihcaan Spain a hitay malingato to misolol to Hongdolasi , oyzaan a mihcaan mala o no micomoday to no Spain a tademaw. 1537～1539 a mihcaan ci Lay-mo-pila a Cong-tong tolo a mang ko Yin-di'-an a tademaw ko palekalay a misabaloco', micoay to micomoday no Xibanya a tademaw to pikowanan. 1539 a mihcaan, Hongdolasi makelac to panokas to Kowa-ti Ma-la o pikowanan to hita a kenis. Hongdolasi i 1821 a mihcaan siwa a bolad sabaw lima a demiad mosakamo to a misateked, nika 1822 a mihcaan papolong a pacomod to Mo-si-ke o saayaway Hong-ti a kanatal. 1823 a mihcaan micomod to Federacion de Centro America, 1838 a mihcaan cacay bataan a bolad miliyas to Federacion de Centro America, patizeng to Kong-he-ko. 1840 a mihcaan Hongdolasi i Kowa-ti-mala misakakoay mikowanay pidamaen ni La-fei-er Ka-ley-la, o misatekeday ci Folang-sis-ke Fere-la patizeng to masakakoay mikowanay to Cen-bo. zikozan no1853 a mihcaan, Hongdolasi i lalabo no kanatal o misakakoay ato misatekeday hina kikasobad ko nipikowan ato mangayaw ko lalabo, sangaleb sato ko nikakotay ko mikawaway no con-bo. o kim, ging kwang mapeci' toway, malilid to ko tabakiay a sapalahad to cin-ci'. makay 1840 a mihcaan malingato. o Yinggoo micalap to Hongdalasi no nowalian a kakitizaan ato Ba-ya-qondao, misanga' to zazan no silamalay, a maala ko ahebalal a lala' a sitongos a micaliw ato pacaliw. kasomamadan to19 a mihcaan to zikozan, Meigoo miala to Sheng-ho-anxi-too a kakitizaan sitongos to sapiala to ging kowang. kasomamadad to 20 a mihcaan to kalingato, Meigoo polong tono heci piyangay a kakanan a kosi tatongosay a heci piyangan a kakanan a kosi mialaw to nowamisan mililis to bayo masaenalay a lala' , palahad paloma to paza', a mihamin mialaw to zazan no silamalay, no bayoay a sacolo', dingkiay ato sapacakay to paza'. katokoh i 1913 a mihcaan Hongdolasi payhon 90% kayadah ko pasay no zomaan a kalaliwnan maemec no Meigoo. i saayaway a ngangayaw no kitakit hawsa, Meigoo sangaleb kalamkam sato to Hongdolasi a cen-ce miemec ato mialaw to cin-ci. kinapina to patahkal to hitay a mikowan to lalaboay a kawaw no Hongdolasi , miemec a misakako mikowan to lalabo no kanatal. i polong no piyangan hecian a kosi to piemec hawsa, Hongdolasi mala o ngangaan to no palomaay to paza' oynian cacayay no kanatal a cin-ci. dadawa malahad ko nipalomaad a paza'. katokoh 1930 a mihcaan nipacakayan a paza' o saayaway motizeng i kitakit. 1929 a mihcaan i kitakitay misakako to no ozipay a nizatengan kalihanawan ko cin-ci o cin-ci no Hongdolasi baeket ko nikasetol, caay to ka kapah ko nikaozi no binawlan amin, o tademaw amin lalid a sibaloco' micoay a mingayaw. Hongdolasi a Kow-min-tang a Cong-tong ci " Tiborcio Carias Andino" i picozoh pidama no Meigoo hawsa, i 1933 a mihcaan maala to ko sapikowan to lalaboay a kawaw. patizeng sato to misakakoay a mikowan, 1954 a mihcaan oynian a kanatal a pcakat to lipida no mikoliay a tademaw, misakapah to sakaozip ato maydih milihiza to kong-hoy a sitongos palekal a papihibang to misakawaway, o Meigoo pakayni piketon piselep to kalisiw sibaloco' to a misolol. hekal no lala' Hongdolasi i Tay-pin-yang ato Cye-le-pi-hay, o angangangan o boyo' a lala' lalabo no kanatal o lano' no ongcoy a enal i dadipasan izaw kya likecoay a masaenalay a kakitizaan. o bali paso pakay sasa no lala' a akoti'ay a bali katokoh i boyo' alababay to ko bali. i bayoay ato boyo'ay pasay bong-pow a mihcaan o odad katoko i toloa malebot haw-mi. cin-ci Hongdolasi a cin-ci a wayway i Cong-mey-cow o to tongosa to, 2012 a mihcaan o piasip Hongdolasi a pademaw palalecad GDP 2.323 ko kalisiw no Meigoo, nisangaan a aca satalakaway ayaw to lima a lamangan o nilacolan nipalomaan to kohi, paza' ko nipalomaan, nipahabanay o kabos ato nanpokoy, cong-li a simal ato misangaay to zikoc. aidangan Hongdolasi izaw ko tosa a lice no niliwanan a saysang i kitakid, no ke-pan Ma-ya i kasomamadanay o mapeciay to kakitizaay a loma' ato Rio Platano Biosphere Reserve. tademaw katokoh ayza 2018 a mihcaan, Hongdolasi o polong no tademaw 9,587,522. 2010 a mihcaan sabaw lima a mihcaan a tademaw palalecad pahon 36,8%, sabaw lima katokoh enem a bataan izaw ko lima a mihcaan payhon 58,9%, enem a bataan izaw ko lima a mihcaan ato pikakaan to payhon4,3%. Hongdolasi a saykay a kasabinacadan palalecad payhon90% o may-s-ti-sow a tademaw, payhon 7% o Me-cow in-ti-an a tademaw, payhon 2% o lemeniay a tademaw ato payhon 1% o salengacay a tademaw. cacolilan Hongdolasi tosa ko tabakiay no kanatal a pahikokian, itini i List of airports in Hondoras ato Saeropoerto Internacional Ramon Villeda Morales. Honngdolasi o tapang a sacolol o zazan no baso, o silamalay a zazan o sapicolo' to paza' ato tebos to nikaloky a tood dada' Hondolasi izaw ko Poerto cortes, tela, lasay-wa a minato, oynian a kanatal oyzaan aca o sihataay a balonga' ko sitatngosay a mikowan.
